Package com.bomber7.core.model.texture

Class ElementTexture

java.lang.Object
com.bomber7.core.model.texture.ElementTexture
Direct Known Subclasses:
MapElement, Square
public abstract class ElementTexture extends Object
Abstract class representing a texture for an element in the game.

    • ID_MASK

      public static final int ID_MASK
      ID_MASK - Mask to extract the texture ID from the combined flags. This mask is used to isolate the right texture ID from the flip flags.
      See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ElementTexture

      public ElementTexture(String textureName, boolean verticalFlip, boolean horizontalFlip, boolean diagonalFlip)
      Constructs a new Square with the specified sprite file path and texture ID.
      Parameters:
      textureName - the file path to the texture image for this square
      verticalFlip - whether to flip the texture vertically
      horizontalFlip - whether to flip the texture horizontally
      diagonalFlip - whether to flip the texture diagonally
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the sprite file path is null or empty

  • Method Details

    • getTextureName

      public String getTextureName()
      Returns the file path to the texture image for this element.
      Returns:
      the texture file path

    • setTextureName

      public void setTextureName(String textureName)
      Sets the name of the texture for this element.
      Parameters:
      textureName - the texture file path

    • isVerticalFlip

      public boolean isVerticalFlip()
      Checks if the texture should be flipped vertically.
      Returns:
      true if the texture should be flipped vertically, false otherwise

    • isHorizontalFlip

      public boolean isHorizontalFlip()
      Checks if the texture should be flipped horizontally.
      Returns:
      true if the texture should be flipped horizontally, false otherwise

    • isDiagonalFlip

      public boolean isDiagonalFlip()
      Checks if the texture should be flipped diagonally.
      Returns:
      true if the texture should be flipped diagonally, false otherwise

    • computeRotation

      public float computeRotation()
      Calculate the rotation base on this elements flip flags.
      Returns:
      the angle of rotation in degrees
